com.compendium.core.db.management
Interface DBProgressListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBConvertDerbyToMySQLDatabase, DBConvertMySQLToDerbyDatabase, DBCopyData, DBCopyDatabase, DBNewDatabase, DBRestoreDatabase, UIConvertFromDerbyDatabaseDialog, UIConvertFromMySQLDatabaseDialog, UIDatabaseManagementDialog, UIMeetingReplayDialog, UIMeetingUploadChoiceDialog, UINewDatabaseDialog
public interface DBProgressListener

DBProgressListener is an interface you can implement to get progress events.

Method Summary
 void progressAlert(java.lang.String sMessage)
          Indicate that progress has had a problem
 void progressComplete()
          Indicate that progress has complete
 void progressCount(int nCount)
          Set the amount of progress items being counted.
 void progressUpdate(int nIncrement, java.lang.String sMessage)
          Indicate that progress has been updated
